channel.title: Need help changeing rewards in pest controll
channel.description:
Hello i have been looking in the file and i can not find were 2 change The Pest controll Rewards so i was wondering if any of you guys could help me out 2 try and look for them if u find it or know how to i would very much like it if u told me thank u very much !@!
~Pktw1nz~

item.title: Need help changeing rewards in pest controll
item.dc:creator: @pktw1nz pktw1nz
item.description:
@pktw1nz wrote:

grr i have but when u right click the void knight it still comes up with full void bandos ect… i change it 2 this …if
(c.option == 1 && c.pcPoints > 99 && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastAction > c.actionInterval){
c.sM(“You have been rewarded a Bandos Set!”);
c.addItem(1077, 1);
c.addItem(1107,1);

but when i compile ect and then go back on and right click the void knight it still says “bandos godsword” ect… [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2008, 05:49:47 pm[/size][hr]but when i clcik buy i get the bandos set… =/

Read full topic
